about-me.first-p: Hello, my name is Daniel Borba, and I have been working in FullStack web development for over 2 years. Currently, my primary technologies are Angular, Node.js, OracleDB, TypeScript, Bootstrap, and Git. Additionally, I have experience and knowledge in Next.js, React, React Native, Flutter, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Prisma, and Docker.
about-me.second-p: I had my initial exposure to programming in 2017 when I started a technical course in Electronics at SENAI, where I learned the C language. Since then, I have been continuously expanding my knowledge and skills in the latest technologies, keeping up with the ever-evolving market trends. This journey has only strengthened my passion for the field.
about-me.third-p: I have successfully completed my higher education in Systems Analysis and Development at IFTM. During my college years, I had the opportunity to work as a Project Manager at BugWare, a junior entrepreneurship initiative. This experience greatly enriched my practical skills and provided me with valuable insights into project management.
about-me.fourth-p: With a proficient level of English, I have a natural aptitude for quickly grasping and adapting to new technologies. I am highly motivated to seek out new experiences and challenges in my professional journey.

know-more.title: Know more
know-more.description: Do you want to know a little more about me ?
